name: root
description: BitTensor subnet 0 (Root) - information not available

name: apex
description: Apex is the first and most intelligent inference model on Bittensor, specializing in deep-researcher reasoning and serving as the network's pioneer of decentralized intelligence.
primary_functions: Provides decentralized AI inference capabilities
Facilitates deep-researcher reasoning on the Bittensor network
Incentivizes participation through validator and miner roles
Supports both mainnet and testnet validation
distinguishing_features: First subnet to achieve deep-researcher reasoning on Bittensor
Includes auto-updater functionality for validators
Structured codebase with separate validator and service modules
Supports testnet validation for development purposes

name: omron
description: Omron is a BitTensor subnet focused on creating a peer-to-peer verified intelligence network using zero-knowledge machine learning (zk-ML) to provide Proof-of-Inference for AI model predictions.
primary_functions: Generating verifiable AI predictions using zero-knowledge circuits
Validating the authenticity of AI predictions through zk-proofs
Incentivizing efficient and secure AI model inference
Scoring miners based on cryptographic integrity and proof generation time
distinguishing_features: Uses zero-knowledge proofs to verify AI model predictions
Supports both CPU and GPU optimized proving systems
Focuses on cryptographic integrity and proof efficiency for rewards

name: τemplar
description: A decentralized training framework that enables large-scale AI model training across heterogeneous compute resources with an incentive mechanism to ensure quality contributions.
primary_functions: Decentralized model training across internet-connected nodes
Incentivized gradient computation and sharing among miners
Validation of miner contributions through loss reduction evaluation
Collaborative model updates through gradient aggregation
distinguishing_features: Momentum-based gradient compression using DCT for efficient sharing
Deterministic data assignment based on miner UID and window number
Validator scoring system based on loss improvement metrics
Support for heterogeneous compute resources in training workflow

name: targon
description: Targon is a secure AI infrastructure platform that leverages Confidential Compute and Protected PCIe technology to provide hardware-enforced security for decentralized AI operations, ensuring verifiable and trustworthy execution from hardware to application layers.
primary_functions: Providing secure AI model inference with hardware-level protection
Enabling verifiable computation through remote attestation
Managing secure memory encryption for AI workloads
Offering isolated execution environments for sensitive operations
distinguishing_features: Hardware-enforced memory encryption and protection
GPU Trusted Execution Environment (TEE) for isolated execution
Secure boot with hardware root of trust
Protected PCIe technology integration

name: hone
description: A Bittensor subnet focused on evaluating AI problem-solving capabilities through ARC-AGI-2 tasks, where validators generate novel problems and miners provide solutions scored for quality and latency.
primary_functions: Generate synthetic ARC-AGI-2 tasks for evaluation
Score miner responses based on exact match, partial correctness, grid similarity, and efficiency
Maintain a decentralized network of validators and miners for continuous problem-solving
Persist performance metrics and results to Postgres for analytics
distinguishing_features: Focus on ARC-AGI-2 problem-solving tasks
Epistula-signed messages for secure validator-miner communication
Postgres-backed analytics and performance tracking

name: infinite_games
description: A subnet focused on incentivizing the prediction of future binary events using LLMs, with applications in improving prediction markets and providing economic forecasts.
primary_functions: Incentivize miners to submit accurate predictions for future binary events
Score predictions using peer scoring and Brier score mechanisms
Generate synthetic events for miners to predict
Provide real-world applications for prediction markets and economic forecasts
distinguishing_features: Focus on judgemental forecasting using LLMs rather than statistical forecasting
Implementation of peer scoring and Brier score mechanisms for prediction accuracy
Integration with real-world data providers like Polymarket and synthetic event generation
Exponential weighting scheme for time series predictions
Potential for arbitrage opportunities in prediction markets

name: subvortex
description: SubVortex is an incentivized and decentralized network of subtensor nodes within the Bittensor ecosystem, focusing on enhancing decentralization, stability, and efficient resource allocation by validating and rewarding miner performance based on availability, latency, reliability, and global distribution.
primary_functions: Validates miner ownership of local subtensor nodes through connectivity checks
Gathers and assesses miner performance metrics including download/upload speeds and latency
Computes and distributes rewards based on miner performance and network contribution
Promotes global distribution of subtensor nodes to optimize network performance
distinguishing_features: Incentivizes decentralization by rewarding miners for running local subtensor nodes
Implements a comprehensive scoring system based on availability, latency, reliability, and geographical distribution
Offers low barrier to entry with minimal hardware requirements for miners

name: proprietary_trading_network
description: The Proprietary Trading Network (PTN) is a decentralized network that aggregates and evaluates trading signals from quant and deep learning models across various asset classes, incentivizing the most profitable and risk-managed trading strategies.
primary_functions: Aggregates trading signals (LONG/SHORT/FLAT) for Forex and Crypto pairs
Evaluates miner performance based on portfolio returns and risk metrics
Implements elimination mechanisms for plagiarism and excessive drawdowns
Distributes incentives to top-performing trading models
distinguishing_features: Implements real-world trading constraints (carry fees, spread fees, slippage)
Uses innovative performance metrics like omega score for miner evaluation
Features a comprehensive dashboard for tracking trader performance
Supports multiple asset classes including Forex and Crypto pairs
Implements strict elimination rules (plagiarism, 10% max drawdown)

name: iota
description: IOTA is an incentivized framework for distributed pretraining of large language models across a network of heterogeneous machines, using a data- and pipeline-parallel architecture to optimize training efficiency and reduce hardware requirements.
primary_functions: Distributes model layers across heterogeneous miners for parallel processing
Streams activations between miners via an orchestrator
Implements token incentives for miners processing activations
Validates miner work through periodic spot-checks
distinguishing_features: Uses a variant of Butterfly All-Reduce for activation merging
Operates with permissionless participation and unreliable hardware
Implements uninterrupted residual flow in model architecture
Provides comprehensive dashboard for network monitoring

name: swap
description: Swap subnet (SN10) incentivizes miners to provide liquidity to the TAO<>USDC pool on TaoFi by rewarding them based on the fees their positions generate within a 24-hour period.
primary_functions: Incentivizes liquidity provision to TAO<>USDC pool
Scores miners based on generated fees from their positions
Facilitates decentralized trading liquidity on TaoFi
Rewards participants for contributing to pool depth
distinguishing_features: Focuses exclusively on TaoFi liquidity provision
24-hour fee-based scoring mechanism
Direct integration with TaoFi's swap functionality
MIT licensed open-source implementation

name: dippy_studio
description: Dippy Studio is an enterprise-grade generative media platform on Bittensor that specializes in Flux LoRA training and multi-modal media inference, serving millions of users with optimized performance and scalability.
primary_functions: Train Flux-based LoRAs for media generation
Run optimized inference for image and other media models
Evaluate output quality, consistency, and latency through validators
Provide self-serve API access for external builders
distinguishing_features: Production-ready media inference subnet with 7M+ users
Custom Dippy Inference Engine for optimized performance
Multi-modal capabilities planned for audio, video, and 3D
Scalable infrastructure designed for enterprise use

name: compute_horde
description: ComputeHorde is a Bittensor subnet that provides scalable and trusted GPU computing power to validators of other subnets, enabling decentralized validation and reducing reliance on centralized cloud services.
primary_functions: Provide decentralized GPU compute resources for Bittensor validators
Ensure fair and verified compute work through stake-proportional task execution
Scale mining operations with multiple executors per miner
Support hardware classes to balance cost and performance
distinguishing_features: Collateral-based trust system for organic jobs to ensure miner reliability
DDoS shield for miners to protect against network attacks
Hardware class system to match jobs with appropriate GPU resources

name: data_universe
description: Subnet 13, Data Universe, is a data-scraping and sentiment analysis subnet that collects and processes large amounts of data from various sources while ensuring compliance with GDPR and ethical standards.
primary_functions: data scraping from diverse sources
sentiment analysis on collected data
GDPR-compliant data processing
ethical data handling and storage
distinguishing_features: strict GDPR compliance policies for miners
focus on ethical and lawful data collection
comprehensive miner guidelines and support resources

name: taohash
description: TAOHash is a Bittensor subnet focused on proof-of-work (PoW) BTC mining hashrate, offering a decentralized marketplace for hashrate backed by smart contracts. It incentivizes miners and validators through direct BTC rewards and subnet-specific alpha tokens.
primary_functions: Incentivizes BTC mining hashrate contribution through TIDES protocol
Distributes alpha tokens to Bittensor-registered miners
Validates and ranks miner performance based on share-value contributions
Provides a public marketplace for hashrate with smart contract backing
distinguishing_features: Dual reward system: TIDES (BTC) and alpha tokens (5% of hashpower value)
No Bittensor registration required for BTC rewards via TIDES
Extensible architecture for other mining projects with verifiable performance

name: bitquant
description: The BitQuant subnet is a decentralized AI framework for quantitative DeFi analysis, providing ML-powered market analytics, portfolio optimization, and risk assessment through natural language interfaces.
primary_functions: ML-powered market analytics for DeFi and crypto markets
Portfolio analysis and optimization
Risk assessment and trend analysis
Quantitative strategy evaluation
distinguishing_features: Real-time market data processing and insights
Agentic framework for digital asset analytics and DeFi strategy
Composable, on-chain quantitative strategies and risk metrics
Natural language interface for quantitative analysis queries

name: bitkoop
description: BitKoop is a decentralized coupon platform that incentivizes miners to find and submit working discount codes, which are then verified by validators to ensure reliability and transparency for shoppers.
primary_functions: Community-sourcing of working discount codes through incentivized miners
Real-time validation of submitted coupons by independent validators
Performance-based rewards for miners and validators based on contribution accuracy
Maintaining a transparent and reliable database of verified discount codes
distinguishing_features: Decentralized and community-powered coupon verification system
Performance-based rewards ensuring only valid coupons are promoted
Integration with affiliate networks for monetization of verified coupons
User-friendly mining process requiring only a VPS for operation

name: 404—gen
description: A decentralized platform focused on democratizing 3D content creation by leveraging generative AI models to produce 3D assets for virtual worlds, games, and AR/VR/XR experiences.
primary_functions: Generating 3D assets via AI models
Providing prompt generation services for 3D content creation
Facilitating decentralized validation of 3D generative models
Supporting real-time 3D asset generation for immersive experiences
distinguishing_features: Utilizes multiple LLM models for diverse and detailed prompt generation
Focuses on predefined object categories tailored for 3D asset market needs
Offers both organic and dataset-based prompt generation methods
Provides a comprehensive dashboard for monitoring subnet activity and validator performance

name: zeus
description: The Zeus Subnet leverages AI models within the Bittensor network to forecast environmental data using the ERA5 dataset, incentivizing the development of faster and more cost-effective alternatives to traditional numerical weather prediction methods.
primary_functions: Forecasting environmental variables at specific locations and timestamps
Integrating latest AI research for continuous model evolution
Providing access to the global ERA5 dataset for training and validation
Evaluating miner performance on heldout environmental data
distinguishing_features: Utilizes the comprehensive ERA5 dataset from Copernicus with hourly measurements from 1940 to present
Focuses on developing data-driven alternatives to traditional numerical weather prediction
Continuously expands environmental challenges and data modalities to evolve subnet capabilities

name: nineteen.ai
description: A subnet focused on AI model training and inference optimization, leveraging decentralized compute resources for efficient machine learning workflows.
primary_functions: Decentralized AI model training
Inference optimization for machine learning models
Resource allocation for distributed compute tasks
Performance benchmarking of AI models
distinguishing_features: Specialized in AI model optimization
Decentralized compute resource pooling
Efficient distributed training workflows

name: bounty_hunter
description: Decentralized AI bounty competition platform where emissions fund bounties for leaderboard success
primary_functions: AI competitions
bounty distribution
model evaluation
leaderboard tracking
distinguishing_features: competition platform for AI models
emissions flow into bounty pots
pays for leaderboard success
automated screener evaluation
decentralized bounty system

name: omega_any-to-any
description: OMEGA Any-to-Any is a decentralized AI subnet focused on developing state-of-the-art multimodal models, starting with voice-to-voice generation, and aiming for true any-to-any modeling that jointly learns from all modalities to create a unified understanding of reality.
primary_functions: Train and evaluate state-of-the-art voice-to-voice generation models
Develop multimodal any-to-any models that learn from all modalities
Provide a decentralized, incentivized platform for AI researchers and contributors
Serve as a high-bandwidth router for specialized models across subnets
distinguishing_features: Dynamic emissions mechanism with a 75/25 split to reward top-performing models
Focus on multimodal-first foundation and Platonic representation hypothesis
Radical transparency with public leaderboards, metrics, and validator tracking

name: desearch
description: Desearch is an AI-powered decentralized search engine on Bittensor that provides unbiased, verifiable search results by analyzing metadata from platforms like X, Reddit, and Arxiv, while offering sentiment analysis and real-time data access.
primary_functions: AI-powered search engine delivering contextual and unfiltered results
Real-time metadata access from platforms like X, Reddit, and Arxiv
Sentiment and metadata analysis for comprehensive understanding of public sentiment
API integration for developers to embed AI search capabilities
distinguishing_features: Decentralized platform ensuring unbiased search results
Customizable data analysis tailored to user requirements
Community-driven innovation with continuous optimization by miners and validators
Integration with multiple data sources including social media and academic platforms

name: nuance
description: Nuance is a decentralized subnet incentivizing factual and nuanced discourse on X by rewarding quality interactions and content that promotes balanced perspectives on contemporary issues.
primary_functions: Incentivizing factual content creation on X through token rewards
Analyzing and scoring engagement quality from verified community members
Filtering and promoting nuanced opinions using LLM verification
Maintaining anti-spam mechanisms to prevent system gaming
distinguishing_features: Hybrid content submission system (direct API + X account verification)
Dynamic scoring formula with engagement quality weighting
7-day sliding window for interaction relevance
Topic-specific scoring based on current focus areas
Influence-weighted scoring for community members

name: omega_labs
description: BitTensor subnet 24 (OMEGA Labs) - information not available

name: mainframe
description: Mainframe is a decentralized science subnet on Bittensor focused on providing computational solutions for life sciences, including protein molecular dynamics simulations and protein-ligand docking, to accelerate drug discovery and scientific research.
primary_functions: Simulate protein molecular dynamics using OpenMM
Perform protein-ligand docking using DiffDock
Generate specialized DFT data for neural network potential models
Provide affordable computational solutions for drug discovery pipelines
distinguishing_features: First decentralized science subnet on Bittensor
Partnership with Rowan Scientific for neural network potential models
High simulation speed of approximately 132,000 nsec/day
Approximately 17 petaflops of computing power

name: kinitro
description: Kinitro incentivizes the development of embodied intelligence agents by enabling miners to publish agents that compete in various tasks, while validators evaluate and score these agents in real-time through a structured evaluation process.
primary_functions: Incentivize miners to develop and submit embodied intelligence agents
Validate and score agent performance across different environments
Facilitate real-time agent evaluation and competition
Provide a dashboard for monitoring agent performance and subnet activity
distinguishing_features: Real-time agent evaluation and scoring system
Integration with Hugging Face for artifact storage
Ray-powered evaluator cluster for scalable agent testing
Comprehensive dashboard for tracking agent performance and subnet metrics

name: neural_internet
description: The Neural Internet subnet (SN27) powers a decentralized GPU compute market where miners contribute GPU resources and validators measure performance to allocate resources efficiently in a trustless, permissionless environment.
primary_functions: Decentralized GPU resource allocation
Performance benchmarking of contributed GPU resources
Dynamic reward distribution based on GPU performance
Facilitating on-demand GPU compute for machine learning workloads
distinguishing_features: Decentralized trustless compute market architecture
Performance-based reward mechanism for GPU contributors
Integration with Bittensor's machine intelligence network
Explicit support for bare-metal GPU providers (no container-based platforms)
Automated blacklisting for anomalous behavior

name: unknown
description: BitTensor subnet 28 (Unknown) - information not available

name: coldint
description: Bittensor subnet 29, known as coldint, focuses on collaborative and distributed model training, research, and sharing innovative ideas related to model structure, training, and evaluation, initially rewarding improvements on the Fineweb-edu-2 dataset.
primary_functions: Advancing collaborative and distributed model training
Facilitating research and sharing of innovative model structures
Rewarding miners for improving model scores on specific datasets
Encouraging contributions through code, bug-fixes, and insights
distinguishing_features: Focus on Fineweb-edu-2 dataset for initial model improvements
Incentivizes both model performance and code/insight contributions
Forked from subnet 9 (pretraining) with dynamic improvements
Active community engagement via Discord and GitHub

name: bettensor
description: Bettensor is a sports prediction subnet on the Bittensor network that allows users to predict outcomes of sporting events and rewards correct predictions, serving as a platform for both sports fans and ML/AI researchers to benchmark predictive models.
primary_functions: Facilitates sports outcome predictions for events like baseball, football (soccer), and American football
Rewards miners for accurate predictions through the Bittensor network's incentive mechanisms
Provides a platform for testing and benchmarking predictive models against human intuition
Operates with minimal computational requirements for human participants
distinguishing_features: Focuses specifically on sports betting predictions as its core functionality
Offers both human and AI participation models with different computational requirements
Implements a minimum staking requirement to ensure network quality and prevent abuse
Supports multiple sports leagues including UEFA and NFL in its current version
Provides legal disclaimers and compliance guidance for betting-related activities

name: candles
description: A decentralized cryptocurrency candle prediction network where miners compete to predict price movements (candle colors and values) and validators score predictions against real market data.
primary_functions: Generate cryptocurrency candle predictions (hourly, daily, weekly)
Score miner predictions against actual market data
Distribute rewards based on prediction accuracy
Support custom prediction files for miners
distinguishing_features: Multiple prediction intervals (hourly/daily/weekly)
Web interface for generating prediction files
Automatic fallback to random predictions when custom files aren't available
Integrated with CoinDesk API for market data validation

name: itsai
description: It's AI is a decentralized AI detection tool that identifies whether text is human-written or AI-generated, offering deep scan functionality to analyze probabilities per sentence.
primary_functions: Detect AI-generated text with high accuracy
Provide sentence-level AI probability analysis
Offer API integration for third-party services
Develop browser extensions for real-time detection
distinguishing_features: Highest accuracy on RAID, GRiD, and CUDRT benchmarks (94.9% at 5% FPR)
Comprehensive product suite including web app, Chrome extension, and Britishizer tool
Established legal entity (ITSAI TECHNOLOGIES - FZCO) for commercial operations
Proven incentive mechanism driving continuous model improvement

name: readyai
description: ReadyAI is a BitTensor subnet that provides a low-cost, resource-minimal data structuring and semantic tagging pipeline, transforming raw data into structured, AI-ready data for vector databases and applications using distributed LLM processing.
primary_functions: Processes raw data into structured, tagged outputs using LLMs
Implements fractal data mining to handle diverse data sources
Validates and scores miner submissions using cosine distance calculations
Provides a scalable, distributed compute solution for data annotation
distinguishing_features: Utilizes LLMs for accurate and cost-effective data annotation
Implements a fractal mining approach for diverse data processing
Distributed validation system for ensuring data integrity
Open-source pipeline with support for multiple LLM providers

name: bitmind
description: GAS (Generative Adversarial Subnet) is a Bittensor subnet that creates a competitive ecosystem where detectors and generators of synthetic media evolve together through adversarial processes, driving innovation in AI-generated content detection and creation.
primary_functions: Evaluate and reward discriminative models for detecting synthetic media
Generate and modify media based on validator prompts
Score and validate both generative and discriminative miners
Maintain a dynamic adversarial loop between content creation and detection
distinguishing_features: Adversarial competition between generators and detectors
Reduced capital requirements for discriminative miners
Continuous evolution of detection capabilities
Integrated reward system for both content creation and detection
Specialized CLI tools for miner and validator operations

name: cartha
description: BitTensor subnet 35 (Cartha) - information not available

name: web_agents_-_autoppia
description: The Web Agents Subnet leverages the Infinite Web Arena (IWA) benchmark to incentivize the development of autonomous web agents capable of navigating and completing dynamic web tasks, aiming to create the world's best web operators through continuous adaptation and performance evaluation.
primary_functions: Generating dynamic web tasks using synthetic data and generative AI
Evaluating autonomous web agents on their ability to complete complex web workflows
Incentivizing miners to develop high-performing web agents through Bittensor's blockchain rewards
Providing a scalable and dynamic benchmark for web agent performance
distinguishing_features: Uses Infinite Web Arena (IWA) for continuous generation of novel web challenges
Combines metaprogramming and Gen AI to create realistic yet unrestricted web environments
Employs hybrid testing methods (HTML verification, backend event testing, visual assessment, LLM-based evaluation) for robust agent evaluation

name: aurelius
description: Aurelius is a decentralized alignment protocol that evaluates AI reasoning through a multi-agent system, focusing on ethical assessment and collective judgment to ensure verifiable alignment.
primary_functions: Generate adversarial prompts for AI systems
Evaluate ethical reasoning in AI responses
Synthesize collective judgment from multiple agents
Maintain data integrity and adversarial robustness
distinguishing_features: Multi-agent architecture with Miners, Validators, and Tribunate
Focus on verifiable AI alignment through adversarial testing
Decentralized approach to ethical reasoning evaluation

name: distributed_training
description: The Distributed Training subnet facilitates decentralized machine learning by enabling distributed training of large models across multiple nodes using the hivemind library for all-reduce operations, with validators coordinating and verifying the training process.
primary_functions: Decentralized distributed training of large machine learning models
Coordination of model training across multiple nodes using hivemind
Verification of training progress and model updates by validators
Integration with Weights & Biases (wandb) and Hugging Face for model tracking and storage
distinguishing_features: Uses hivemind library for decentralized all-reduce operations
Requires integration with both wandb and Hugging Face for full functionality
Supports auto-updating miners and validators via PM2 process management
Implements DHT (Distributed Hash Table) for peer discovery and coordination
Includes specific error handling for distributed training edge cases

name: basilica
description: Basilica creates a trustless marketplace for GPU compute by verifying hardware capabilities, managing distributed GPU resources, and integrating with Bittensor's consensus mechanism.
primary_functions: Hardware verification and profiling of GPU capabilities
Remote validation of computational tasks via SSH
Orchestration and management of distributed GPU resources
Providing load-balanced access to GPU compute via API gateway
distinguishing_features: Binary validation system for secure GPU verification
SSH-based remote verification of hardware and tasks
Integrated fleet management for distributed GPU resources
Smart HTTP gateway with authentication and caching
Native Bittensor integration for consensus and weight allocation

name: chunking
description: The Chunking subnet specializes in processing and organizing large datasets into manageable chunks for efficient data handling and retrieval, optimizing storage and access in decentralized environments.
primary_functions: Data segmentation into smaller, manageable chunks
Efficient storage and retrieval of chunked data
Optimization of data access patterns for decentralized systems
Metadata management for chunked datasets
distinguishing_features: Specialized in handling large-scale data segmentation
Optimized for decentralized storage solutions
Advanced metadata management for chunked data

name: sportstensor
description: Sportstensor is a decentralized sports prediction subnet that incentivizes the development of machine learning models capable of outperforming market closing odds in sports betting markets through a competitive AI-versus-AI environment.
primary_functions: Predicts sports match outcomes using machine learning models
Calculates and scores prediction accuracy against closing market odds
Manages miner commitments to specific sports leagues for focused predictions
Distributes incentives based on predictive performance and edge over market
distinguishing_features: Focuses exclusively on sports prediction markets with real-world betting applications
Uses a rolling prediction threshold system to maintain current performance metrics
Implements strict skip prediction limits (15% max) to ensure miner participation
Maintains a dedicated database (SportsTensorEdge.db) for historical prediction tracking

name: gopher
description: A BitTensor subnet focused on Twitter-related operations, featuring cookie management and authentication systems for miners and validators, with support for both Docker and Kubernetes deployments.
primary_functions: Twitter cookie generation and management
Cookie refresh systems for Docker and Kubernetes environments

SSH-based cookie updates for remote Docker hosts
distinguishing_features: Integrated Twitter cookie management system
Dual support for Docker and Kubernetes deployments
Automated cookie refresh capabilities
TEE worker integration for miners
SSH-based remote cookie updates

name: graphite
description: A decentralized network focused on solving graph optimization problems, particularly the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP), by leveraging Bittensor's decentralized machine learning infrastructure to connect miners and validators for efficient computation.
primary_functions: Solving the Traveling Salesman Problem (TSP) efficiently
Connecting miners and validators for decentralized computation
Generating and evaluating synthetic graph optimization requests
Providing scalable solutions for complex optimization problems
distinguishing_features: Specialized in graph optimization problems like TSP
Leverages Bittensor's decentralized network for computational efficiency
Future plans for a user-friendly frontend interface for problem input
Focus on accessibility, innovation, and community feedback

name: score
description: Score Vision is a decentralized computer vision framework on Bittensor that provides cost-effective and scalable video analysis, initially focusing on Game State Recognition in football to revolutionize sports analytics.

Real-time processing of high-definition video streams

distinguishing_features: Lightweight validation combining frame filtering and semantic assessment

name: talisman_ai
description: Talisman AI serves as the eyes and ears of a wallet integrated AI reasoning agent, collecting data from markets, chains, and sentiment. The Talisman agent translates those signals into clear trading and staking insights for users.
primary_functions: Market analysis for subnet trading
Wallet-integrated AI agent for trading insights
Data collection from markets, chains, and sentiment
Trading and staking recommendations

Multi-source data aggregation from markets, chains, and sentiment

name: resi
description: RESI (Real Estate Super Intelligence) is a decentralized network focused on building the world's largest open real estate database by aggregating property data from various sources through a specialized BitTensor subnet.
primary_functions: Decentralized collection of real estate data from multiple sources
Validation of property data accuracy and completeness
Geographic prioritization of data collection through zipcode-based weighting

name: reboot
description: A decentralized AI-powered robotics network that enables developers to build, deploy, and validate intelligent robotic systems with distributed computation and secure consensus.
primary_functions: AI-powered robot control and decision-making
Distributed analysis of robotics sensor data
Coordinated multi-robot task allocation and execution

name: quantum_compute
description: The Quantum Compute subnet (qBitTensor) accelerates practical quantum computing by democratizing access to quantum resources, fostering innovation through decentralized problem-solving, and addressing near-term quantum challenges like error rates and computational scalability.
primary_functions: Execute and verify Peaked Circuits to identify hidden bitstrings using quantum computation
Optimize quantum hardware and simulator performance for accurate and efficient circuit execution

name: synth
description: The Synth Subnet leverages Bittensor's decentralized intelligence network to generate the world's most accurate synthetic data for price forecasting, focusing on probabilistic forecasts that capture the full distribution of possible price movements and their associated probabilities.

Evaluate probabilistic forecasts using the Continuous Ranked Probability Score (CRPS)

Support options trading and portfolio management with price probability distributions

Uses CRPS to evaluate both calibration and sharpness of forecasts
Generates synthetic data with realistic price dynamics like volatility clustering and fat-tailed distributions

name: lium.io
description: A decentralized, peer-to-peer GPU rental marketplace that connects miners providing GPU resources with users needing computational power, facilitated by the Bittensor network.
primary_functions: Enable GPU resource rental for computational tasks like machine learning and data analysis
Facilitate miner compensation based on GPU performance and quality
Provide a user-friendly frontend interface for browsing and renting GPU resources

name: dojo
description: Dojo V2 is a decentralized Generative Adversarial Network (GAN) subnet on BitTensor that transforms traditional GANs into a competitive environment where miners act as both generators and discriminators, incentivized to produce outputs superior to a high-quality baseline.

Zero-sum incentive mechanism for quality outputs
Browser-based mining without server setup
Continuous improvement of generative model outputs

Competitive zero-sum incentive structure for quality
Dual miner roles as both generators and discriminators

name: efficientfrontier
description: EfficientFrontier is a decentralized machine learning subnet designed to identify optimal risk-weighted trading strategies by integrating live trading data and AI models, providing users with professional trading tools through SignalPlus's platform.
primary_functions: Evaluate trading strategies based on risk-adjusted returns
Calculate daily scores for strategies using weighted returns and drawdown metrics
Rank strategies to distribute rewards based on performance

distinguishing_features: 14-day observation period for new strategies before ranking
Exponentially weighted daily returns to prioritize recent performance
Customizable trading frequency settings (Frequent, Base, Infrequent)
Integration with SignalPlus's professional trading toolkit
Decentralized, censorship-resistant AI model training for trading strategies

name: yanez_miid
description: MIID (Multimodal Inorganic Identity Dataset) is a Bittensor subnet focused on identity testing and data generation to enhance fraud detection, KYC systems, and name-matching algorithms by simulating identity-related risk scenarios and providing high-quality identity variations.
primary_functions: Generate name variations and identity attributes for fraud detection
Evaluate and score identity matching algorithms
Provide identity data for AI model training

description: A distributed DEX aggregator and swap intent solver engine that optimizes trade execution by leveraging a subnet-native incentive mechanism to deliver better prices, reduced fees, and faster trades across multiple chains.
primary_functions: Execute quotes and compute candidate settlements to maximize user surplus
Collect and benchmark swap orders through distributed APIs
Attest and co-sign the best settlement solutions for on-chain execution
Incentivize miners with solver fees and emissions based on performance
distinguishing_features: Batch auction mechanism for swap intent processing
Cross-chain liquidity access and optimization
Winner-takes-most incentive model for miners
Validator-co-signed settlement bundles for secure execution

name: taonado
description: Taonado is a zero-knowledge (ZK) based token mixer for the Bittensor ecosystem, enabling private TAO transactions by severing the link between sender and receiver addresses. It incentivizes participation through rewards for contributing to network privacy and security.
primary_functions: Enable private TAO deposits and withdrawals using zk-SNARKs
Provide flexible deposit pools (0.1, 1, 10, 100, or 1000 TAO)
Reward users for contributing to network liquidity and privacy
Facilitate permissionless withdrawals to any address
distinguishing_features: Zero-knowledge privacy for TAO transactions
Decentralized validation approach without traditional validators
Incentivized participation through liquidity rewards and privacy points
Anti-Monitoring Liquidity (AML) mechanism for enhanced privacy
Fujita Privacy Scale to quantify transaction privacy risk

name: level_114
description: A Bittensor subnet where miners register Minecraft servers with a collector service and validators evaluate server performance metrics to determine network weights and rewards.
primary_functions: Register Minecraft servers with collector-center-main service
Collect and report server performance metrics
Evaluate miner performance through validator queries
Distribute rewards based on performance scores
distinguishing_features: Automatic one-time registration for Minecraft servers
Performance-based weight assignment for miners
Decentralized validator evaluation system
Specialized metrics collection for game servers

name: soulx
description: SoulX is a Bittensor subnet specializing in creating sentient Digital Souls for interactive entertainment, enabling game developers to integrate NPCs with persistent memory, evolving personalities, and natural dialogue capabilities.
primary_functions: Generate authentic and intelligent NPC dialogue for video games
Maintain persistent memory of player interactions
Evolve NPC personalities based on player actions
Drive narrative through unscripted, goal-oriented dialogue
distinguishing_features: Specialized in high-quality, culturally-resonant NPC interactions
Uses a proprietary dataset inspired by legendary RPGs
Validators act as Game Masters designing micro-quests for miners

name: taolend
description: TaoLend is a decentralized lending protocol within the Bittensor ecosystem that enables users to lend TAO while borrowers secure loans using subnet ALPHA as collateral, enhancing capital efficiency and network security.
primary_functions: Facilitates point-to-point lending and borrowing of TAO using ALPHA as collateral
Allows lenders to set flexible interest rates based on market conditions
Integrates Bittensor and EVM ecosystems for seamless transactions
Provides incentivized participation through rewards for lending and borrowing
distinguishing_features: Direct interaction between lenders and borrowers without third-party approval
Automatic conversion of rewards into Subnet 116 ALPHA to align incentives
Flexible loan cycles with options for early repayment and lender recall

name: brainplay
description: Brainplay is a Bittensor subnet that benchmarks AI models through competitive gameplay, making AI evaluation transparent and engaging by allowing users to visually assess model performance in games like Codenames.
primary_functions: Benchmarking AI models through competitive gameplay
Evaluating model performance in the Codenames board game
Distributing rewards based on game outcomes and staking amounts
Providing a transparent and intuitive method for AI evaluation
distinguishing_features: Uses gameplay as a visual and intuitive benchmarking method
Implements a reward system tied to game performance and staking
Supports both local LLM and API-based miners
Features an auto-update mechanism for validators

name: hodl_etf
description: The HODL ETF subnet incentivizes long-term conviction in cryptocurrency investments by functioning as an ETF (Exchange-Traded Fund) subnet, with future plans to expand into an ETF exchange and derivatives market.
primary_functions: Incentivizes long-term cryptocurrency investment through staking mechanisms
Distributes subnet emissions based on stake amount and duration
Plans to introduce an ETF exchange in future versions
Future roadmap includes adding futures and options trading
distinguishing_features: Uses a unique scoring formula that rewards both stake amount and duration
Integrated with TrustedStake indexes for emission distribution
Future plans include automatic buybacks from transaction fees
Zero-code setup for miners with simple validator implementation
Focuses specifically on ETF-like cryptocurrency investment products

name: akihabara
description: Akihabara is a decentralized visual intelligence network designed for AI-native creators, focusing on generating continuous 2D manga-style worlds with narrative and character memory on-chain.
primary_functions: Generate sequential 2D manga-style artwork
Maintain narrative continuity across generated panels
Store and recall character and scene memory on-chain
Support AI-native creators in building evolving visual worlds
distinguishing_features: Focus on sequence and narrative continuity rather than single-frame generation
On-chain memory for characters and scenes across panels
Specialized in manga-style artwork generation
Decentralized network tailored for visual storytelling

name: affine
description: Affine is an incentivized reinforcement learning environment that rewards miners for making incremental improvements on tasks like program abduction or coding, using a sybil-proof, decoy-proof, copy-proof, and overfitting-proof mechanism to commoditize reasoning.
primary_functions: Incentivize miners to submit and improve models on RL tasks
Evaluate models on a set of RL environments to find the pareto frontier model
Load balance and make models publicly available via Subnet 64 (Chutes)
Provide an SDK for evaluating models across different environments
distinguishing_features: Winners-take-all mechanism forcing miners to improve the pareto frontier model
Integration with Chutes for model deployment and inference load balancing
Pre-built Docker images for evaluation environments via Affinetes
Sybil-proof, decoy-proof, copy-proof, and overfitting-proof design

name: sundae_bar
description: A decentralized subnet focused on incentivizing and rewarding high-quality contributions in a collaborative environment, possibly related to data curation or community-driven content.
primary_functions: Incentivizes user contributions through token rewards
Facilitates decentralized content or data validation
Supports community-driven governance mechanisms
Provides a platform for collaborative decision-making
distinguishing_features: Focus on community-driven contributions
Token-based incentive system
Decentralized validation mechanisms

name: bitrecs
description: Bitrecs is a recommendation engine subnet on Bittensor that provides real-time e-commerce product recommendations using LLMs, aiming to increase sales and engagement for online merchants.
primary_functions: Generate real-time product recommendations for e-commerce sites
Measure and improve recommendation quality through LLM ensemble methods
Increase merchant sales metrics like add-to-cart rates and conversion
Provide simple integration plugins for platforms like Shopify and WooCommerce
distinguishing_features: Focus on e-commerce recommendations with measurable sales impact
Privacy-preserving design with no PII collection
Works with existing store catalogs without recommending third-party products
Uses LLM voting ensemble method for improved recommendation quality

name: mantis
description: MANTIS is a Bittensor subnet that rewards miners for providing embeddings which help predict financial instrument price movements with a 1-hour horizon, using validator-evaluated salience scores for weight allocation.
primary_functions: Collect and evaluate encrypted embeddings from miners for financial prediction tasks
Compute salience scores using per-hotkey logistic gating and XGBoost aggregators
Manage time-lock encrypted payloads with a 300-block decryption delay
Allocate on-chain weights based on miner performance and challenge-specific criteria
distinguishing_features: Time-lock encryption for price prediction fairness
Multi-challenge aggregation with configurable weight distribution
LBFGS-specific evaluation with combined classifier and Q salience scoring
Strict payload validation and Cloudflare R2 commit requirements

name: swarm
description: Swarm is a Bittensor subnet designed to enable decentralized autonomous drone flight by evaluating pre-trained RL policies in a PyBullet physics simulator, aiming to become the go-to control intelligence for micro-drone navigation.
primary_functions: Generates unique map tasks for drone flight simulations
Evaluates pre-trained RL policies in a headless PyBullet physics simulator
Assigns rewards based on flight performance metrics like success and speed
Provides a decentralized platform for open-source drone flight algorithms
distinguishing_features: Uses PyBullet physics simulator for realistic drone flight evaluation
Winner-Take-All reward mechanism with top performer receiving 25% of emissions
Focus on open-sourcing flight algorithms for safer and more accountable drones

name: 8_ball
description: BitTensor subnet 125 (8 Ball) - information not available

name: tiger_beta
description: BitTensor subnet 126 (Tiger Beta) - information not available

name: astrid_intelligence
description: BitTensor subnet 127 (Astrid Intelligence) - information not available

name: byteleap
description: ByteLeap is a distributed compute resource platform that connects GPU providers with the Bittensor network, enabling miners to aggregate worker resources and earn rewards through active compute leases and computational challenges.
primary_functions: Aggregates GPU and CPU resources for distributed compute tasks
Facilitates compute leases through integrated marketplace APIs
Executes computational benchmarks for idle workers
Manages worker lifecycle and resource allocation
distinguishing_features: Two-phase verification system for challenge performance to prevent cheating
Weighted scoring system combining lease revenue and challenge performance
Support for high-performance NVIDIA GPUs including data center models
Three-tier architecture with validator, miner, and worker components
